plain: Most of the movies listed are action or drama, with a few comedies and fantasy. The plots are mostly original, with a few adaptations. The musical scores are mostly epic or dramatic, with a few lighter scores. The mood of the scores is mostly serious, with a few lighter moods. The settings are mostly modern or historical, with a few science fiction or fantasy settings. The visual styles are mostly realistic, with a few more stylized or fantastical styles. The writing styles are mostly conventional, with a few more experimental or stylized styles. The runtimes are mostly conventional, with a few longer or shorter runtimes. The themes are mostly serious or dramatic, with a few lighter or more fantastical themes.
